description: The document describes attributes of the "variant" object, which e.g. can be instantiated as database documents in a MongoDB collection.

attributes.name: digest
attributes.description: concatenated unique specific elements of the variant
The identifier ("callset.id") of the callset this variant is part of.
attributes.name: callset_id

attributes.description: The identifier ("biosample.id") of the biosample this variant was reported from. This is a shortcut to using the variant -> callset -> biosample chaining.
attributes.name: biosample_id

attributes.description: Reference name (chromosome). Accepting values 1-22, X, Y.
attributes.name: reference_name
start
attributes.type: array of 1 or 2 (for imprecise end position of structural variant) integers

attributes.description: Mate name (chromosome) for fusion (BRK) events; otherwise left empty. Accepting values 1-22, X, Y.
attributes.name: mate_name
end

queries.description: the query will return all variants with any overlap of the CDKN2A CDR

attributes.type: array of 0 (for presise sequence variants), 1 or 2 (for imprecise end position of structural variant) integers

attributes.description: list of bases at start position in the reference genome, which have been replaced by the alternate_bases value; for precise variants
attributes.name: reference_bases
genotype
attributes.type: list of strings, which represent the (phased) alleles in which the variant was being observed

attributes.description: the variant type in case of a named (structural) variant (DUP | DEL | BRK ...)
attributes.name: variant_type

attributes.description: additional variant information, as defined in the example and accompanying documentation
attributes.name: info
updated
attributes.description: time of the last edit of this record, in ISO8601

name: variant
